large_preview_cards2.title: Challenges Faced by Financial Organizations
large_preview_cards2.subtitle: Cloud native technologies help finance firms deliver a better customer experience with faster, scalable, secure, and compliant applications. However, finance companies suffer as they hesitate to adopt modern technologies like microservices & DevOps.

items.title: Delayed Delivery
items.description: Scaling individual sections or changing existing features in monolithic apps can be complex.
items.additional_description: The lack of third-party integration via APIs can slow down banking and finance companies (BFSI) in adapting to rapidly changing consumer demands.

items.title: Compliance Issues
items.description: Compliance with GDPR, PCI-DSS, CCPA, LGPD, POPIA, PSD2, GLBA, and data privacy laws hold immense significance for banks and financial institutions.
items.additional_description: Constantly evolving regulations demand agile solutions, but monolithic technologies can hamper the process.

items.title: Auto Scaling
items.description: Online banking operates 24/7, catering to users who want to take advantage of trading fluctuations.
items.additional_description: Unexpected shutdowns lead to user distrust among regular customers and investors. Slow apps during health emergencies might affect the insurer’s marketability.

items.title: Slow Performance
items.description: Customers expect to receive real-time transactions & updates. If your application lags, you risk losing customers & fostering dissatisfaction among users and employees.
items.additional_description: Build with cloud native tech to ensure swift operations for happy customers & workforce.
